messages: What is most imprtnt mineral for your heart? Acrdng to Dr. Andersen, it's magnesium! Mg is also essential 4 bone, muscle, n nerve conduction
Mg deficiency has been linked to high BP, migraines, osteoporosis, diabetes, cancer, asthma, and heart arrhythmias. Dr A
